title: No vintage overlay on splashes for vintage skin owners
body: Every other patch this breaks, why cant i have my vintage overlay for the skin i bought

replies.body:
Hey 3 1415thon - 

As I'd mentioned in the other reply, I'm going to follow up with the team and see what the status is on this.

**EDIT**: This may just be related to Curling Veigar, looking at the bug tickets. D: Also, I have someone looking into it this week. If all goes well, this should be resolved in 6.10.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=r1rPd6UF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-27T22:25:22.715+0000)
>
> Hey 3 1415thon - 
> 
> As I'd mentioned in the other reply, I'm going to follow up with the team and see what the status is on this.
> 
> **EDIT**: This may just be related to Curling Veigar, looking at the bug tickets. D: Also, I have someone looking into it this week. If all goes well, this should be resolved in 6.10.

Don't think it's Curling Veigar specific. Noticed that my other account doesn't have the vintage border for Haunting Nocturne or Candy Cane Miss Fortune.
Hmm. Okay. We'll do a full sweep and make sure we catch all of the overlays are set up properly. ^-^ Thanks for the heads up!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=r1rPd6UF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-29T17:29:36.301+0000)
>
> Hmm. Okay. We'll do a full sweep and make sure we catch all of the overlays are set up properly. ^-^ Thanks for the heads up!

Will there ever be another point in time where people who bought vault skins or seasonal skins for the first when they were released will get vintage covers and icon?
We don't currently have anything planned. The vintage borders were originally created because content that was **limited**, was then changed to **legacy**.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=r1rPd6UF,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-02T16:14:57.959+0000)
>
> We don't currently have anything planned. The vintage borders were originally created because content that was **limited**, was then changed to **legacy**.

Aw, ok. Thanks ^_^
